name: Verify invited User access
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `User` role via **API**.

### Verify that `User`:

- **Cannot** access organization Settings.
- **Cannot** access organization Billing.
- **Cannot** invite member to organization.
- **Cannot** edit organization members.
- **Cannot** delete members from organization.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with User role via API.

Verify that User:

  • Cannot access organization Settings.
  • Cannot access organization Billing.
  • Cannot invite member to organization.
  • Cannot edit organization members.
  • Cannot delete members from organization.

testStage.description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `User` role via **API**.

### Verify that `User`:

- **Cannot** access organization Settings.
- **Cannot** access organization Billing.
- **Cannot** invite member to organization.
- **Cannot** edit organization members.
- **Cannot** delete members from organization.
testStage.descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with User role via API.

Verify that User:

  • Cannot access organization Settings.
  • Cannot access organization Billing.
  • Cannot invite member to organization.
  • Cannot edit organization members.
  • Cannot delete members from organization.
